attributes.action: Install barriers on the North Bank, Forty Foot and Sixteen Foot Bank Cambridgeshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How many more people have to die or go into the water on the Fenland roads before barriers are installed or at least speed cameras?
7 people have died in the last 3 years and numerous others were lucky in that they managed to escape. 4 cars had already gone into North Bank before March this year.
Stop talking about the cash and put people lives before that.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Install barriers on the North Bank, Forty Foot and Sixteen Foot Bank Cambridgeshire."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21581


Prime Minister's Office
